description: Divi-divi (Caesalpinia coriaria) is an amazing plant species native to South America whose appearances astonishes many. This large shrub or small tree has an unusual growth habit, with branches that twist and curl as they grow, giving the tree a unique and beautiful aesthetic. The tree produces small flowers and drupes that are consumed by birds and animals, creating a stunningly diverse ecosystem for the area. Its beans are also used in a variety of products, including medicines and beauty products, showcasing the incredible versatility of the tree. Divi-divi is an amazing species that is sure to make an impression on any landscape.
